Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews

Class TUIView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.View
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.TUI.TUIViews.TUIView
Direct Known Subclasses:
TUIConnectionView, TUIGameView, TUILobbiesView, TUITitleView
public class TUIView extends View
Singleton class representing the Terminal User Interface (TUI) view. It extends the abstract View class and implements various methods for displaying different screens and handling user input in the terminal.

  • Field Summary
